citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
* A facility representative was not available on 3/13/14 at 5:00 PM to do a facility inspection.
* Closed gate prevented entrance to this facility. Inspector called telephone numbers given by licensee. Inspector
waited required 30 minutes for licensee to show up.
* Copy of inspection report was sent by regular mail.
